import React from "react"; import { Link ,useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import Badge from 'react-bootstrap/Badge' import Modal from "../Modal"; import Cart from "../screens/Cart"; export default function Navbar() { const [view,setView]=useState(false) const navigate=useNavigate(); const handlelogout=()=>{ localStorage.removeItem("authToken"); navigate("/login") } return (

) : (
